renderer.Camera

  • Uses of Camera in renderer

    Methods in renderer that return Camera
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Camera
    Camera.setRayTracerBasic(RayTracerBasic ray)
    setting the ray tracer for the camera
    Camera
    Camera.setVPDistance(double distance)
    setting the distance between the view plane and the camera
    Camera
    Camera.setVPSize(double width, double height)
    setting the size of the view plane for the camera
    Camera
    Camera.setWriter(ImageWriter writer)
    setting the writer image to create an image
